content: this time i raffle a cool shirt with the writing: 'Bitcoin - fuck inflation' ¬†this shirt has the color black and is original sealed and has never been worn. the size is for us: 'medium' resp. for eu: 'large' rules:- only one spot per person- i reserve the right to exclude certain users who have attracted negative attention in the past from the competition.- should the shipment get lost in the postal way, you will not be entitled to a replacement!- just choose one of the letters/numbers below and you are in the game- as soon as we have filled all spots, i will choose a block to start the raffle - the last letter/number of the hash wins.good luck!!! ¬†1 - tweetious2 - sunnybwoy3 - Frank AlpenCoin4 - Mbitr5 - PeakDK6 - Est20137 - krogoth8 - OgNasty9 - The_Crypto_Kid0 - Remsjacka - bitbollob - haloxonc - MoparMiningLLCd - Dernostee - 5tiftf - JanEmil

comments.body: OgNasty - 8Thanks for putting on this free raffle.¬† Gotta love free stuff right.¬† I also wasn't familiar with this shirt, but am very familiar with the feeling...¬† Fuck inflation!I like the old english lettering as well.¬† Gives it a real OG feeling to it.¬† I must say that there's no possible way I could fit into a Medium, but this would make a truly great gift for me to give someone and that's the best prize I could think to win here.¬† So thanks again and good luck to all the participants!
